title: Michaël Aklin
text:
I am associate professor of economics and holder of the Chair of Policy & Sustainability (PASU) at EPFL (Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Lausanne).
In addition, I am also Managing Director of Enterprise for Society (E4S), a joint center between EPFL, IMD, and the University of Lausanne.
I study the economics and politics of sustainable and steady development and the policies to achieve it.
\(\rightarrow\) To learn more about my group’s research, check the PASU Lab page.
\(\rightarrow\) My CV is here.
\(\rightarrow\) My Google Scholar page is here.
Our group regularly works with partners from civil society, industry, and public policy. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you want to collaborate. I can be reached at michael.aklin@epfl.ch.
